name: Fat Plastic
description:
FAT PLASTIC

My submission for the Disc Room Game Jam. 

I wanted to make some sort of vinyl-digging beat-making sim but quickly realized that Game Maker's audio functions were a bit too limited for what I wanted. I was busy with other things these two weeks so this is what I made. 

Don't expect a game because this just turned into an excuse for me to mess around with clay graphics and not much else. 

Controls: Click click.
